channel.title: Scratch Addons Docs
channel.description: Recent content on Scratch Addons Docs

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Installing Let’s get started by installing Scratch Addons. Store Pasang Supported browsers Chrome Web Store Google Chrome and other Chromium-based browsers Add-ons for Firefox Mozilla Firefox Microsoft Edge Addons Microsoft Edge More information can be read on Installing. Getting started To get started, you need to access the settings page of the addon to see the functions of it. Locate Scratch Addons on the toolbar and click it. Usually, it is on the top-right corner of your browser.

item.title: Installing
item.description: From extension stores Scratch Addons is available in these stores. Store Pasang Supported browsers System requirements Chrome Web Store Google Chrome 80+ Microsoft Edge 80+ Opera 67+ Brave 1.3+ Vivaldi 2.11+ Chromium 80+ Windows 7+ OS X / MacOS 10.11+ Chromebooks less than ~6 years old Add-ons for Firefox Mozilla Firefox 86+ Windows 7+ OS X / MacOS 10.12+ Microsoft Edge Addons Microsoft Edge 80+ Windows 7+ OS X / MacOS 10.
